title: Ghosts and Family Legends
description: Fifteen ghost stories to hear around the Yule log.Contentsvii • Introduction (Ghosts and Family Legends) • essay by Richard Dalby1 • The Italian's Story • (1859) • short story by Catherine Crowe13 • The Dutch Officer's Story • (1859) • short story by Catherine Crowe20 • The Old Frenchman's Story • (1859) • short fiction by Catherine Crowe (variant of The Old French Gentleman's Story)30 • The Swiss Lady's Story • (1859) • novelette by Catherine Crowe43 • The Sheep Farmer's Story • (1859) • short story by Catherine Crowe54 • My Friend's Story • (1859) • short story by Catherine Crowe59 • Round the Fire • (1859) • novella by Catherine Crowe94 • Seventh Evening • (1859) • short story by Catherine Crowe
author: Catherine Crowe
